:mod:`slurm.googledrive`
========================

.. py:module:: slurm.googledrive


Module Contents
---------------

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   slurm.googledrive.GoogleDrive



.. class:: GoogleDrive

   Allow downloading of sharable files using their link

   .. method:: url_to_id(self, url)


   .. method:: download(self, link, destination=None, dumpHeader=False, download=True)

      :link: shared link of file from google drive
      :destination: file name if you want over ride the original OR zipped files
      :dumpHeader: debug, print response info
      :download: debug, do everything but actually download file

      Return: (bool, filename)


   .. method:: get_confirm_token(self, response)


   .. method:: save_response_content(self, response, destination)
